jade.ui
Class TermPanel

java.lang.Object
  jade.ui.Terminal
      jade.ui.TermPanel

public class TermPanel
extends Terminal

Implements a Terminal through a JPanel, which can be embedded in any container.

getFramedTerm

public static TermPanel getFramedTerm(int tileSize,
                                      int cols,
                                      int rows,
                                      java.lang.String frameTitle)
Returns a new TermPanel with custom dimensions, placed inside a JFrame, which has been given frame title.

Parameters:
tileSize - the size of each tile
cols - the number of columns initially shown
rows - the number of rows initially shown
frameTitle - the title of the JFrame
Returns:
a new TermPanel, with the custome dimensions

a new TermPanel, with the default dimensions

updateScreen

public void updateScreen()
Description copied from class: Terminal
Updates the screen to reflect the current state of the buffer. Without a call to this method, there is no guarantee that the screen will be updated to reflect the screen buffer.

Specified by:
updateScreen in class Terminal
